entry.title: [GRA3/5/7/9/11][Public Cloud] - Network maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 22, 2025, 21:00 UTC  -  Jan 23, 2025, 05:00 UTC

Dec 24, 10:22 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our network infrastructure.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 22/01/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 23/01/2025 05:00 UTC
Service impact : None. Except during the rollback phase (scheduled between 01:00 UTC and 02:00 UTC), access to running PCI instances will not be possible during 1 to 5 minutes.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our products and services, we will carry out a network hardware upgrade in our Graveline Datacenters.

The operation is carried out in several steps:

- Step 1: Preparation of the operation (about 3 hours)
- Step 2: New hardware implementation (about 2 hours)
- Step 3: Test and activation of the new hardware (about 2 hours)
We would like to inform you that during the second phase of our upcoming operation, scheduled for between 01:00 and 02:00 UTC, a rollback may be required. In this case, instances will continue to run, but access will be temporarily impacted for a duration of less than 5 minutes.

entry.title: [GRA5/GRA7/GRA9/GRA11/SBG5/WAW1/SGP1/BHS5/SYD1/DE1/UK1/OR1/VA1][Public cloud] - End of life for Kubernetes 1.26
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 15, 2025, 08:00 UTC  -  Jan 16, 2025, 17:00 UTC

Nov 21, 21:41 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be migrating all Managed Kubernetes Service to the new version.

Start time : 15/01/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 16/01/2025 17:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact except for the apps that do not support the new version.
Service improvement : The aim of this maintenance is to upgrade deprecated clusters to a supported newer version.

Thank you for your understanding.

Nov 7, 13:34 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 04/12/2024 09:00 UTC
End time : 04/12/2024 17:00 UTC
Service impact : Chartmuseum will be definitely removed in prevision of upgrade to Harbor version 2.8. If you are still using Chartmuseum to manage Helm Charts, please migrate before the 4th december by following this tutorial: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-public-cloud-private-registry-migrate-helm-charts?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0058869
Helm Charts stored in Chartmuseum not migrated before this date will not be available anymore.

Thank you for your understanding.
